name: Homer the Flanders Killer 6
summary:
Flanders Killer 6, you wanted, here it is! In the sixth sequel of the funny shoot 'em up Simpsons game the killing spree isn't over yet. Help Homer to wipe out the entire Flanders family. In each level you will find yourself in a new situation and it is up to you to find Ned, Maude, Rod and Todd Flanders and kill them.

Try to shit them into the head or perform a combination of body shots to eliminate them. Be sure to spare all other Simpsons characters. The Flanders will hide behind houses, trees and just everything they can find. Be quick to shoot them and win this funny theme game.
